item.title: [Delta] Thieving problems [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

if (objectID == 629 && playerLevel[17] >= 20) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { actionInterval = 2800; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 10000); addSkillXP(750, 17); sM("You steal from the stall and receive some gold!"); } else if (playerLevel[17] > 20) { sM("You need a Theiving Level of 20 to steal from this stall"); } }

item.title: [Delta] Thieving problems [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“jmk600, post:1, topic:392259”]I made my stall a global object.

I used this code:

if (objectID == 4277) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { actionInterval = 2800; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 1000); addSkillXP(250, 17); setAnimation(881); sM("You steal from the stall and receive some gold!); } }

And this code for my higher level one:

if (objectID == 629 && playerLevel[17] >= 20) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { actionInterval = 2800; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 10000); addSkillXP(750, 17); sM("You steal from the stall and receive some gold!); } else if (playerLevel[17] > 20); sM("You need a Theiving Level of 20 to steal from this stall"); } }

And so I got 100 errors. Please help me.

I delete these codes. Errors go away. Weird. Please help![/quote]

Might help if you posted the errors.

Also, in your first block of code, you didn’t add the ending " in the sendMessage, which would probably be the cause.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Thieving problems [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @jmk600 jmk600
item.description:
@jmk600 wrote:

I made my stall a global object.

I used this code:

if (objectID == 4277) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { actionInterval = 2800; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 1000); addSkillXP(250, 17); setAnimation(881); sM("You steal from the stall and receive some gold!); } }

And this code for my higher level one:

if (objectID == 629 && playerLevel[17] >= 20) { if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { actionInterval = 2800; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 10000); addSkillXP(750, 17); sM("You steal from the stall and receive some gold!); } else if (playerLevel[17] > 20); sM("You need a Theiving Level of 20 to steal from this stall"); } }

And so I got 100 errors. Please help me.

I delete these codes. Errors go away. Weird. Please help!
